conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric interior with extruded walls (height/thickness), visible floor plane, and removed roof/ceiling.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Not scored due to automatic rejection triggered by major layout/room omissions relative to the 2D plan.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Not scored due to automatic rejection; the 3D layout does not correspond to the provided 2D plan (core spaces and geometry not preserved).

interior_elements.notes: Not scored due to automatic rejection.

visual_clarity.notes: Not scored due to automatic rejection.

detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the rooms/spaces implied by the 2D plan (e.g., kitchen/dining/utility/WC configuration and their adjacencies) are missing or replaced by a different arrangement in the 3D model.
Overall layout fidelity failure: wall runs, room proportions, and adjacency relationships in the 3D render do not align with the 2D floor plan.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it does not match the provided 2D floor plan and omits/changes the majority of rooms, triggering automatic rejection.
